titleNullable: NIH xray dataset tfrec with labels
subtitleNullable: this dataset contains 120,100 images of chest xray scans and labels in tfrecord
descriptionNullable:
this dataset was collected and pre-processed from the NIH chest x-ray dataset, which contains about 120,100 images.

due to difficulties with processing such a large amount of data, on conventional GPU's, and CPU's, I've decided to convert all the images to tfrecords with their corresponding labels (835 unique values).
which means we can now use TPU's to analyse the data, and build better classification models. 

you can decode the images, by looking for 'image' and 'label' in the images.tfrecords files. 
hopefully this would make a better use of the dataset.
also, the dictionary txt file contains every unique label and it's corresponding number in the data.

please put to good use:)

refrences:
Xiaosong Wang, Yifan Peng, Le Lu, Zhiyong Lu, MohammadhadiBagheri, Ronald M. Summers.ChestX-ray8: Hospital-scale Chest X-ray Database and Benchmarks on Weakly-Supervised Classification and Localization of Common Thorax Diseases, IEEE CVPR, pp. 3462-3471,2017
